title: Art fonts by Iza W & Paulo W
content:
[Iza W](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906235011/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/person/w/iza/) & Paulo W have made some of the more interesting art fonts around. Posing as [Intellecta Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906235011/http:/www.intellectadesign.com/), the Brazillian pair claim to be the [creators and owners of the largest typeface library in Latin America.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906235011/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/intellecta/)

[Check out their Top 17](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906235011/http:/www.intellectadesign.com/topten.html), or [browse the collection of 117](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906235011/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/foundry/intellecta/). Gorgeous, amazing stuff. Everything is very reasonably priced. [Their Gans series is currently 50 pecent off!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906235011/http:/www.myfonts.com/specials/2785/)

[Gans Adorno](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906235011/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/gans-tipo-adorno/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906235011im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/gans-tipo-adorno_5159.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906235011im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/littler-serifada_3566.jpg)

[This is fabulous.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906235011/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/fin-fraktur/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906235011im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/fin-fraktur_4421.jpg)

“Intellecta Design is a Brazilian typefoundry interested in typographical research and revivals of all forms of ancient typefaces and handwriting styles. It searches historical churches, museums and similar institutions to develop handwriting and other fonts from old documents. This kind of research is not common in Brazil. In addition, its design team also works to create new and modern typefaces for all applications.”

Samples & bio text courtesy of Myfonts

Mr.Google tells me typophile has no references to Iza W.

j a m e s
author: James Arboghast
